eu.stratosphere.nephele.event.job

Class VertexEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.event.job.AbstractEvent
      • eu.stratosphere.nephele.event.job.VertexEvent

  • public class VertexEvent
extends AbstractEvent
    Vertex events are transmitted from the job manager to the job client in order to inform the user about changes in terms of a tasks execution state.
    Author:
    warneke

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VertexEvent(long timestamp, JobVertexID jobVertexID, java.lang.String jobVertexName, int totalNumberOfSubtasks, int indexOfSubtask, ExecutionState currentExecutionState, java.lang.String description)
      Constructs a new vertex event object.

      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)

      Returns the current execution state of the subtask this event belongs to.

      Returns an optional description which may be attached to this event.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VertexEvent

        public VertexEvent(long timestamp,
                   JobVertexID jobVertexID,
                   java.lang.String jobVertexName,
                   int totalNumberOfSubtasks,
                   int indexOfSubtask,
                   ExecutionState currentExecutionState,
                   java.lang.String description)
        Constructs a new vertex event object.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the timestamp of the event
        jobVertexID - the ID of the job vertex this event belongs to
        jobVertexName - the name of the job vertex this event belongs to
        totalNumberOfSubtasks - the number of subtasks the corresponding vertex has been split into at runtime
        indexOfSubtask - the index of the subtask that this event belongs to
        currentExecutionState - the current execution state of the subtask this event belongs to
        description - an optional description
